name: For the Hospitalized & the Adorably Bored
description:
For the Hospitalized & the Adorably Bored is a collection of recent watercolors and drawings by Bernie McGovern. Inspired by the hospitalized students he teaches, these works take the form of impossible biology, dreamed video games, flaming figures, and space-faring kittens.  

Self published, perfect bound, 120 full color pages

name: An Army of Lovers will be Beaten Vol 1
description:
Set during a war between a blue-skinned people and constellations in the night sky, An Army of Lovers will be Beaten is the story of officers on furlough overseas. Pilot Lt. Buckeley arrives in the port town of Catalpa looking only for a place to nap but quickly finds himself dodging punches, bombs, and perverts. His profound gift for staying alive and near tragic level of kindness opens a world of friendship, mass murder, visions, anxiety, and song. With a cast angelic and degenerate alike, this is a tale of enormous domination and even greater empathy.

Volume One: Chapters 1-3
Black & White 189 pages
Soft cover

name: An Army of Lovers will be Beaten Vol 2
description:
An Army of Lovers Will Be Beaten, Volume 2 is a collection of the most recent chapters of the Army of Lovers saga. Six years running, this story follows the surreal happenings in a war between a blue-skinned people and constellations in the night sky. Join Lieutenant Buckeley and his peeping-tom Llama on a voyage through rat-wrestling, psychosis, temporal plumbing, and digestive mythology.

Books 4 - 6 collected.
Self published, perfect bound, 168 pages, B&W with some full color pages.

name: DemonDust Mini Comic
description:
DemonDust is the monthly autobiographical mini-comic by Bernie McGovern. What began as a chronicle of the trials and joys of quitting drinking has settled into musings on creativity. 

Buy an issue for $2 individually or select the 2 year subscription option below for $20. Preview information on each issue can be found at Rockwellfarmer.com. 

Your subscription includes two years of the monthly comic and any goodies Bernie can throw at you in between. Goodies include inkjet reproductions of watercolor paintings, bookmarks, and the occasional sculptural object. Subscribers are also entitled to the entire backlog of DemonDust/DemonGun and any future anthologies self-published by the author. Be sure to include your mailing address!

name: DemonGun USB Drive
description: This hand made plastic usb drive serves as issue #4 to the autobiographical mini-comic DemonGun/Dust series. Itâ€™s packed with my animations, music, and some miscellaneous things that you can erase & replace with your own peculiar media. 1 gig capacity.
